Text: Great description of the movie, this is how it should be done! What we need is technical details like what the Mediainfo program says about the video file, dont waste our time by pasting information from imdb.com about the movie, we can find that ourselves. Posting a link to imdb.com is quite sufficient. The information posted here tells me that this video file will play on my standalone player and thats what I want to know. Its not funny to download a movie and then find that for example there is "Global Motion Compensation" (GMC) tucked into the file. Thats a definite killer for most standalone players as far as I know. (Divx certified players) Well done, Emery2010 !
